title: Create Interview with Job Description

steps.value: Looking for a 2-year experienced JavaScript developer with AWS experience

expected_result: Job description is saved and skill recommendations are displayed

title: Select Skills from AI Recommendations
expected_result: Selected skills are displayed and skill list is updated

title: Set Difficulty Level of Questions
expected_result: Difficulty level is set to Moderate

title: Review and Customize Standard Questions
expected_result: Standard questions are displayed and preferred answer is set

title: Review and Customize Role-Based Questions
expected_result: Role-based questions are displayed and preferred answer is set

title: Create Interview with AI Avatar (Advanced Plan)
expected_result: AI avatar is selected and lip syncing alignment is enabled

title: Create Interview
expected_result: Interview is created and unique public interview link is generated

title: Candidate Video Interview Submission
steps: Navigate to the job posting page with a public link
Click on the 'Responses' tab
Verify the candidate's video interview is listed
Click on the candidate's video interview
Verify the video recording, structured answers, scores, and resume are displayed
expected_result: The candidate's video interview details are displayed correctly

title: Interview Screening and Scoring
steps: Navigate to the 'Interview Screenings' section
Verify the candidate's interview score is displayed
Verify the candidate's communication score is displayed
Verify the AI-generated summary of the interview is displayed, including observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: The candidate's interview scores and summary are displayed correctly

title: Résumé Screening and Recommendation
steps: Create an interview and upload multiple résumés
Verify the AI commences the screening process
Verify the résumé score is displayed for each candidate
Verify the AI recommendation for each candidate is displayed
expected_result: The AI provides a realistic assessment of the candidates' experience and recommends suitable profiles

title: Candidate Advancement and Interview Link
steps: Decide to proceed with a candidate based on the AI recommendation
Verify the option to send an interview link to the candidate
Verify the interview link is valid for 24 hours
Verify the candidate can submit their interview at their convenience
expected_result: The candidate can submit their interview successfully

title: Initiating Interview Screening Process
steps: Verify the candidate has submitted their interview
Initiate the interview screening process
Verify the summary of the interview is displayed, including scores and AI analysis
expected_result: The interview screening process is initiated successfully and the summary is displayed correctly
